resources.string: o wile ala e nasin len
lipu open li kama lon poki ni.
lipu len open li kama lon poki ni.
o pali e kulupu poki sin
o weka e nasin pi wile mute
o pana e poki wile tawa kulupu
o lukin e lipu awen ale
kulupu Mozilla li pali e ilo %1$s.
nasin len la ilo %1$s li weka e sona pi lipu lukin sina lon weka sina. ni li len ala e sina tawa ilo lipu tawa kulupu lawa. taso jan ante li kepeken ilo sina la nasin ni li len e sina tawa ona.
o kama sona pona e nasin len
sina weka e poki ale tan ilo la ilo %1$s li weka e sona awen sina. %2$s
sina wile lukin e poki ante poka la o tawa e ilo pi nasin poki kepeken nena.
o pini e ni lon lipu wile
poki o weka ala weka lon tenpo mun wan?
sina lukin ala e poki lon tenpo suli la ilo %1$s li ken weka e ona.
o pini e poki kepeken lawa sina ala
o lukin e poki pi tenpo poka
o lukin e poki poka ale
o lukin e poki lukin ale
ilo namako li lon ilo sina. taso sina li ken ala e ona
ilo namako ni li pona tawa jan mute
o alasa e ilo namako ante
ilo li ken ala e ilo namako
o jo e ilo namako pona
o pana tawa lipu lawa ilo
o pana tawa lipu lawa ilo
o pana tawa lipu lawa ilo…
o pana tawa lipu lawa ilo…
kulupu Xiaomi la ilo li wile e ken ante tawa ni: sina ken pana e ilo tawa lipu lawa. o lukin e nasin ilo sina.
o open e ni lon ilo ante
o nasin sina e lipu lawa
o kepeken nasin lukin lipu pi ilo suli
o lukin ala e lipu pi ilo namako
o lukin pona ala e lipu
o pana e lipu tawa poki pi nasin len ala
o open e lipu ale kepeken ilo %1$s
ni li wile e tenpo lili. sina ken ante e ni lon wile.
o weka ale e lukin pini lipu
o alasa e nimi tan poki ilo
nasin len la ilo li ken ala ken pana e toki alasa ken?
o kama pona. ilo o nasin sina
kule sin. awen sin. olin jan pi sin ala.
ilo Firefox la toki lawa pi len sona
o sona e pona tan ilo Firefox
kulupu mi li utala e ni: kulupu mani li wile alasa ike e sina lon ilo.
o open e lipu ale kepeken ilo alasa ni
ilo ni li weka pona e sitelen mani ike.
ilo ni li weka pona a e ni: kulupu ike li wile alasa e sina tawa mani.
ilo ni li alasa e sona pona tan sitelen musi.
ilo ni li pimeja e selo lipu.
o pana e pona tawa ilo Firefox
o kama pona tawa ilo Firefox
ilo Firefox li wile awen e len sina. o lukin e %1$s
o pona e suli tawa ilo Firefox
o alasa e ilo lawa wan
o nasin e ilo alasa ante
o sona e ilo Firefox Suggest
o pana e pilin lon ilo Google Play
o open e lipu ale kepeken ilo alasa ni

o alasa e poki tan alasa pini
o open e lipu lon ilo ante lon tenpo seme
o alasa sin e wile mi lon tenpo ale
o kama e ilo namako tan ilo sina
ilo li wile lukin e sitelen QR tan lipu firefox.com/pair
o lukin e alasa pini ale
o open e poki pi nasin len

sina kama jo e lipu la sina ken lukin e ona lon ni.
o pana e nimi nasin pona
o pana e lipu tawa poki sin
o pana e lipu ale ni tawa poki sin

o poki e ijo pona sina.\no kulupu e ijo pi alasa sama. ni la sina ken lukin pona e ona lon tenpo kama.
o pali e kulupu poki sin
mi ken ala pana e lipu ilo ni tawa lipu kasi
o pana tawa ilo ante ale
pana lipu la o kama tawa ilo Firefox lon ilo ante
o open e lipu ale kepeken ilo Firefox
sina lukin e lipu lon ilo %1$s la ilo ante li ken ala alasa e sina

mi ante nimi e kulupu poki ni
mi awen e lipu lon kulupu “%s”!
nimi li pana ala e kon. ona li lon tawa ni taso: sina ante e suli nimi la nimi li pona ala pona tawa lukin?
